WeInTrade is dedicated to deliver cost effective products and rewarding services to our clients around the world.

What We Offer

Barware

Whole bar sets with leading brands for promotions, cover Ice Bucket, Wine Shaker, Hip Flask, Ice Tong, Jigger, Serving Tray, Wine Rock etc.

BBQ Tool

Grill, Fork, Shovel, Oil Brush, Charcoal, Flammable Paper, Disposable Bowl, Chopsticks, Bamboo Stick, Iron Brush and so on. All available.

Cup & Mug

Based on various types and recyclable materials, there have Plastic Cup, Ceramic Mug, Stainless Steel Bottle, Thermos Flask, Wooden Tumbler and so on.

Digital Item

Fashion design and popular styles, involve USB, Powerbank, Travel Adaptor, Earphone, Headset, Speaker etc.

Glass

Supply lots of different kinds of Glass products, in order to match the needs of international market.

Knife Set

Stainless Steel Knife Set and Ceramic Knife Set, higher quality and better price.

Luggage & Bag

Travel luggage, Trolley bag, Hardcase, Suitcase, Cosmetic bag etc., customized logo and color are all accepted.

Office Supply

Offer practical items, include Pen, Notebook, File Folder, Plastic Holder, Document Bag, Envelope Pocket, Clear Sheet etc.

Services

Factory Promotional Items ODM Printing International Shipping
& & & & &
Products Inspection Premiums OEM Packaging Logistics

Why Choose WeInTrade

A Professional Team
